title: Sound On: President Biden's Speech on Guns
itunes:title: Sound On: President Biden's Speech on Guns
description:
Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discuss gun control and the President's Prime-time speech.

Andrew Husby, US and Canada Economist for Bloomberg Economics, previews the May jobs report  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
